Uses of Class
Catalano.Core.IntPoint

  • Packages that use IntPoint 
    Package Description
    Catalano.Core
    The Catalano.Core contains common classes used by other namespaces of the framework and classes, which can be used independently for various purposes.
    Catalano.Imaging
    The Catalano.Image contains base class for manipulation of pixels.
    Catalano.Imaging.Filters
    The Catalano.Imaging.Filters namespace contains collection classes, which provide different image processing filters.
    Catalano.Imaging.Tools
    The Catalano.Imaging.Tools namespace contains collection classes, which provide different image moments, analysis textures.
    Catalano.Math
    The Catalano.Math namespace contains set of math utilities, which are used by other Catalano framework's namespaces or may be used individually.
    Catalano.Math.Geometry
    The Catalano.Math.Geometry namespace contains set of geometry utilities, which are used by other Catalano namespaces or may be used individually.
